name: 余彥廷
objective: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
schedule:
Week 1: Ch1. Measurement
       Ch2. Motion Along a Straight Line
Week 2: Ch3. Vectors
       Ch4. Motion in Two and Three Dimensions
Week 3: Ch5. Force and Motion–I
Ch6. Force and Motion–II
Week 4: 國慶日放假
Week 5: Ch7. Kinetic Energy and Work
Week 6: Ch8. Potential Energy and Conservation of Energy
Week 7: 1st midterm exam (10/30)
Week 8: Ch9. Center of Mass and Linear Momentum
Week 9: Ch10. Rotation
Week 10: Ch11. Rolling, Torque, and Angular Momentum
Week 11: Ch12. Equilibrium and Elasticity
        Ch13. Gravitation
Week 12: 2nd midterm exam (12/4)
Week 13: Ch14. Fluids 
Week 14: Ch15. Oscillations
Week 15: Ch16. Waves–I
Week 16: 元旦放假
Week 17: Ch17. Waves–II
scorePolicy:
Homework: 30 %
1st midterm exam: 20 %
2nd midterm exam: 20 %
Final exam: 30 %
